Translations.Text: Those emigrated GOD they persecuted my iste robit it them generously v this zivot recompense Hereafter je vecer velka they len zauzlit
This bol because they steadfastly persevere v ich Lord they trust
My nie send ona clovek my inspirovat. Ziadat those zauzlit scripture ona nie zauzlit
My zadovazit them proofs scriptures. My sent nadol ona this odkaz proclaim ludia everything sent nadol them perhaps they zrkadlit
those kut plany zly kut plany zaruka ze GOD will nie zapricinit zem robit do zhltnut them ze retribution nie pojdem them when they menej expect it
It strike them chvila they bol asleep they never escape
it strike them chvila they fearfully expecting it Tvoj Lord je Compassionate Merciful
they nie seen all things Have created GOD Ich shadows surround them vela vlavo v total submission do GOD a willingly
Do GOD prostrates everything heavens everything on zem! -Kazdy creature -A so robi angels; maly arrogance
They reverence ich Lord high them they robi co they commanded robit
